topics.body: I just remembered a funny/cute story about my mom.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5539db686368727646090100#post_5539db686368727646090100
Do tell!
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body: Well when I was going through school I had a laptop. It was nothing too special just something I browsed the internet and did work on. Well one day I headed out to do something, I honestly don't remember what though. So I go and do the thing. I get home and my mom comes outside. And she's in tears. Like crying her fucking eyes out. So I ws thinking something really really bad had happened. So I run up to her worried as fuck and ask her what's wrong. And she starts apologizing profusely. Like over and over and over again. Through some shenanigans, my laptop got broken. And she was having a panic attack thinking I was gonna be mad about it. Obviously I wasn't. Because it was just a possession. It took me TWENTY minutes to get it through to her that I wasn't mad at her.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body:
My mother is the type that doesn't take shit from anyone.
Hence why I love her.

But seriously, if something were to happen to my things I think she would feel sorry about it too. Sure, she wouldn't cry, but she would probably try to make up for it. I have a very kind mom, but she's not afraid to call people out on their bullshit if they do something stupid.
